Description.Text:
Property Location
In the heart of Arona, Apartamentos HG Tenerife Sur is close to Los Cristianos Beach and Golf Las Americas. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Las Vistas Beach and Arona Pyramid.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 189 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Apartamentos HG Tenerife Sur, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Arona? This hotel has 1076 square feet (100 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Apartamentos HG Tenerife Sur, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

In the heart of Arona, Apartamentos HG Tenerife Sur is close to Los Cristianos Beach and Golf Las Americas. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Las Vistas Beach and Arona Pyramid.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Los Cristianos Beach - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Golf Las Americas - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Las Vistas Beach - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Arona Pyramid - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Magma Art and Congress Centre - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Veronicas Strip - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Siam Park - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Troya Beach - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Torviscas Beach - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Camel Park - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Aqualand Costa Adeje - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Golf Los Palos - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Puerto Colon - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Gran Sur Shopping Center - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Bobo Beach - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi

The preferred airport for Apartamentos HG Tenerife Sur is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 13.1 km / 8.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
